com.example.messagesiphon

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.messagesiphon.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the main data loading operations of the app. It loads, saves, and deletes file data, as well as downloading Facebook Message and Stream activity using a MessageManager and a StreamManager.
    Author:
    Tom

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataManager(com.facebook.Session session)
      This creates a DataManager object that will handle all of the app's data collection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collectData(boolean collectMessages, boolean limitToMonth, boolean collectStream, boolean loadOldData)
      This method allows for the collection of Facebook message and Stream data, and is the primary method of the class.
      void collectParticipantInformation()
      Method to load the Facebook ID - Name matches then and then to put them in all User instances
      void deleteOldData()
      Method to delete saved data
      java.util.ArrayList<Conversation> getConversations() 
      java.util.ArrayList<StreamObject> getStreamObjects() 
      void loadOldJSONData()
      This method loads all previously saved JSON data
      void saveJSONData()
      This method saves off all loaded data concerning the Facebook messages and stream.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataManager

        public DataManager(com.facebook.Session session)
        This creates a DataManager object that will handle all of the app's data collection
        Parameters:
        session - an initialized and authenticated Facebook session

    • Method Detail

      • collectData

        public void collectData(boolean collectMessages,
               boolean limitToMonth,
               boolean collectStream,
               boolean loadOldData)
        This method allows for the collection of Facebook message and Stream data, and is the primary method of the class.
        Parameters:
        collectMessages - Should Facebook messages be collected
        limitToMonth - Should messages older than one month be ignored
        collectStream - Should stream data be collected
        loadOldData - Should old data be loaded

      • saveJSONData

        public void saveJSONData()
        This method saves off all loaded data concerning the Facebook messages and stream. It does not currently save off ID-Name pairs

      • loadOldJSONData

        public void loadOldJSONData()
        This method loads all previously saved JSON data

      • deleteOldData

        public void deleteOldData()
        Method to delete saved data

      • getConversations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Conversation> getConversations()
        Returns:
        The list of conversations loaded

      • getStreamObjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<StreamObject> getStreamObjects()
        Returns:
        The list of Stream objects loaded

      • collectParticipantInformation

        public void collectParticipantInformation()
        Method to load the Facebook ID - Name matches then and then to put them in all User instances
